name: Moto Bike Road Rush: Figh-t Atta-ck Race 3d
name_original: Moto Bike Road Rush: Figh-t Atta-ck Race 3d
description:
Strap on the helmet, pull over the safety guards and be prepared for the extreme race on the daredevil’s ride! Don’t under estimate this race, as you will face insane attacks from the opponent motorcycle riders. There will be hurdles in the way and frustrating obstacles. Pass them to avoid dangerous accidents.

Moto Bike Road Rush features:
- A vast collection of world class bikes like Yamaha, Suzuki, Ductai etc.
- Different characters to choose from. Every one of them has unique abilities.
- Realistic physics throughout the game.
- HD graphics
- Addictive gameplay
- Easy controls
- 3 modes to play: knockout, free ride, time mode

========> How To Play <==========
- Tilt your phone to Steer Motorcycle
- Drive Close to upcoming Cars and vehicles to gain extra score
- Tap punch or kick button to attack the nearest biker
